abstract: Op-Ed article by education policy expert David L Kirp praises work done by Internationals Network for Public Schools, which has been engaged in providing quality education for American-born children of unauthorized immigrants; suggests network's success shows that teaching styles that work for regular children work just as well for immigrant children.
lead_paragraph: The Internationals Network for Public Schools uses a hands-on, collaborative approach to teach immigrant students.

headline.main: How a School Network Helps Immigrant Kids Learn
